organizations: CNN.com Obama
title: Obama plays with baby
text:
CNN.com
Obama bonds with baby Updated 1618 GMT (2318 HKT) June 5, 2015 Washington (CNN) Being the President of the United States often comes with mounting stress and a mounting list of opponents. However, there is one demographic with which President Obama seems to not be having much trouble: children. White House Photographer Pete Souza shared a photo on Instagram Thursday of the President in the Oval Office, playing with Ella Harper Rhodes, daughter of Deputy National Security Adviser Ben Rhodes. A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Jun 4, 2015 at 3:47pm PDT Souza has captured several other moments in which Obama bonds with children. Here's a look back at some of those interactions: A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on May 22, 2015 at 3:44pm PDT A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Apr 22, 2015 at 6:13pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Apr 29, 2015 at 12:31pm PDT A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Apr 16, 2015 at 6:07pm PDT A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Mar 23, 2015 at 4:21pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Jan 4, 2015 at 6:45pm PST A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Dec 31, 2014 at 1:10pm PST A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Dec 24, 2014 at 1:33pm PST A photo posted by Pete Souza (@petesouza) on Oct 31, 2014 at 5:19pm PDT A photo posted by The White House (@whitehouse) on Oct 22, 2014 at 8:32pm PDT
